description: The first exit report on travellers arriving via plane and boat shows a 3% increase in air numbers.
title: Rise in Alderney passengers despite Aurigny flight cuts
title_page: Rise in Alderney passengers despite Aurigny flight cuts - BBC News
maintext: The remaining 54% of travellers arriving in Alderney came from Guernsey, which saw a 17% reduction in the number of flights between July and September 2019, falling from 839 to 696 from the same 2018 period.
